title: Gift of Magic Icon

embed.description: Unlike other champs, Xayah and Rakan can be gifted using IP between April 19-26! Gift Xayah or Rakan to a friend for just 6300 IP (normally 7800 IP) and unlock an exclusive Summoner Icon for yourself (also works if you gift using RP).

body: Hi, i was just wondering  if I gift the Cosmic Dawn Rakan bundle to my friend, will I unlock the Gift of Magic Icon. All it says in the page is that i will unlock the icon if i gift rakan or xayah. Does this mean i must gift the champion seperately and not in the bundle? Thankyou <3

replies.body: You'll need to gift the champion themselves in order to get the icon, and you can't actually gift bundles quite yet. Just like Lew said, be sure to check out this [**announcement**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions?utm_source=LeagueClient) for all the details on their Icons and how to gift them!
You can't actually gift bundles.  To get the icon you just need to gift the champion to a friend.

> [{quoted}](name=Lew,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AUykGKPi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-20T06:16:00.890+0000)
>
> You can't actually gift bundles.  To get the icon you just need to gift the champion to a friend.

Got beaten to it ^
Though if anyone knows how long the icon takes to appear, that'd be great. Still waiting on mine and I gifted yesterday.

The icons can take up to 2 weeks after the event ends as per the [announcement ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions?utm_source=LeagueClient)
